last_episode_to_air.name: The Bigger They Are
last_episode_to_air.overview: A cop wants evidence against a club owner who sells pcp to kids.

name: The Fall Guy
overview: Hollywood stuntman Colt Seavers picks up some extra pocket money by using his rough-and-tumble skills to track and capture bail jumpers.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Colt chases a crooked sheriff and tries to protect a friend and his family.

episodes.name: The Meek Shall Inherit Rhonda
episodes.overview: Milton Bach is a computer hacker who ripped off the bank and ran. His wife, Rhonda, and friend Jerry stole the money and went to Mexico. He wants her back.

episodes.name: The Rich Get Richer
episodes.overview: The bounty keeps them on the run as he tries many places to sell the bonds he stole. Kay Faulkner is a recurring character as the insurance agent trying to recover the bonds.

episodes.name: That's Right, We're Bad
episodes.overview: Danny was framed by 'Animal' for an armored car robbery.  If he goes to jail, 'Animal' will kill him. Colt and Howie go under cover in prison to protect him and it all goes awry.

episodes.name: Colt's Angels
episodes.overview: Colt is sent to the Mohave Desert to bring back a biker wanted for drug dealing, rape and assault. He infiltrates the biker club and competes with them in difficult stunts.

episodes.name: The Human Torch
episodes.overview: Colt is sent to a country town to pick up an arson suspect. The town's people of Federalsburg, and the suspect's mother, insist he is dead and buried.

episodes.name: The Japanese Connection
episodes.overview: Colt is sent after the Rio Brothers who are much worse than he knows.

episodes.name: No Way Out
episodes.overview: In Las Vegas at a cycle show, Shecky turns himself in to Big Jack and tells her he needs a bodyguard. Reluctantly, Colt takes the assignment.

episodes.name: License to Kill (1)
episodes.overview: Colt and company go to Hawaii to catch a man who turns out to be trying to stop an assassination. Things get mixed up and Colt becomes a target.

episodes.name: License to Kill (2)
episodes.overview: Colt and company go to Hawaii to catch a man who turns out to be trying to stop an assassination. Things get mixed up and Colt becomes a target.

episodes.name: Goin' For It
episodes.overview: A trio of small time crooks are using cars to smuggle jewels out of the country and hit a snag when one of them sells the cars to Howie to smash up for the movie.

episodes.name: The Adventures of Ozzie and Harold
episodes.overview: Harold had a run-in with his brother and now faces life as Ozzie, a homeless man. He witnesses a murder and becomes a target.

episodes.name: Soldiers of Misfortune
episodes.overview: The bounty is a mercenary trainee. Colt and Howie have to 'join up'. In the process, they meet a woman journalist with her own reasons for pursuing this story.

episodes.name: Ready, Aim, Die
episodes.overview: A man says he must find his brother, a gambler with a big debt, before the 'hit man' does. The bookie has sworn to make an example of him. Some action takes place in the display of floats for the Tournament of Roses parade.

episodes.name: Ladies on the Ropes
episodes.overview: Eddie needs three days, so he can attend bout and prove his innocence. These skips always have a good reason to delay. He manages women wrestlers. Howie is persuaded to to take part as Handsome Howard.

episodes.name: The Snow Job
episodes.overview: In Aspen, a politician's wife tells Colt that she shot her husband in self-defense, but he is saying he did it himself.

episodes.name: Guess Who's Coming to Town?
episodes.overview: The statute of limitations will run out for a young man in just two days. He is related to a VIP, so caution is needed.

episodes.name: Child's Play
episodes.overview: Libby's father is planning to testify against the mob, but what they don't know is that Libby has a photographic memory and the evidence is in her brain.

episodes.name: Charlie
episodes.overview: In Las Vegas, Colt runs into an old partner and finds out she is involved in a fraudulent scheme. Jody is kidnapped to be a hostage and there is a stagecoach chase.

episodes.name: Three for the Road
episodes.overview: A pretty jewel thief hops off to Mexico with Colt and his friends, joined by insurance investigator Kay Faulkner, hot on her trail

episodes.name: The Silent Partner
episodes.overview: When a country music star kills his ghost writer and pins the blame on his chauffeur, it's up to Colt to set the record straight.

episodes.name: Scavenger Hunt
episodes.overview: Some naval officers were involved in a $5 million robbery in HI and they are looking for the man holding the money. For some reason, they just can't find the money.

episodes.name: Bail and Bond
episodes.overview: Colt and company go to Rio de Janeiro after a bail-jumper involved with money laundering. The local cop tells them to help him catch the Countess or else.

episodes.name: The I'ves Have It
episodes.overview: Terri sends Colt to Aruba to bring back a burglar, but it turns out she is one of twins and had a good reason for the breaking and entering, but which one did it?

episodes.name: Colt's Outlaws (1)
episodes.overview: Colt organizes his stuntman friends into a biker club to stop a man who runs the town of Littlefield and oppresses the citizens.

episodes.name: Colt Breaks Out (2)
episodes.overview: Colt organizes his stuntman friends into a biker club to stop a man who runs the town of Littlefield and oppresses the citizens.

episodes.name: Mighty Myron
episodes.overview: An orangutan in a carnival sideshow is accused of murder and slated to be destroyed, but some of the carnival workers want to save him.

episodes.name: Reluctant Traveling Companion
episodes.overview: A woman bail jumper demands she be returned by train rather than plane. She raises a ruckus and disturbs the man in the next compartment who happens to be Richard Burton.

episodes.name: A Piece of Cake
episodes.overview: A New York City police officer tries to take advantage of Colt in his scheme to frame a syndicate member.

episodes.name: Hell On Wheels
episodes.overview: Jody is persuaded to join a Roller Derby team, and steps are taken to see that she is hired, when they have to arrest one of the female skating stars.

episodes.name: How Do I Kill Thee? Let Me Count the Ways
episodes.overview: A man is tricked into supplying computer tapes by using a fake auto accident and telling him the other victim died, thus making him a murderer. Two bumbling detectives take the case

episodes.name: Win One for the Gipper?
episodes.overview: Colt's nephew and a friend are kidnapped by some army men who want to have a winning football team.

episodes.name: Happy Trails
episodes.overview: Two con men sell a stolen car to Howie to use in the movie when he tells them the car will be smashed. The law begs to differ. When the conmen run, a posse of cowboy stars takes off after them

episodes.name: Manhunter
episodes.overview: Colt is sent off to Mexico to bring back two jewel thieves. An undercover private detective has the same objective.

episodes.name: The Further Adventures of Ozzie & Harold
episodes.overview: Ozzie is back. This time he has witnessed a murder while rag-picking. He temporarily regains his sanity, but not for long.

episodes.name: Death Boat
episodes.overview: When a jewel thief has plastic surgery and takes a cruise to recover, Colt and insurance investigator Kay Faulkner join the cruise along with Howie and Jody who pretend to be an invalid and his nurse. Now if only they could identify the thief.

episodes.name: Eight Ball
episodes.overview: Colt tries to dry out an alcoholic former pool expert and protect him from the mob, so he can enter and maybe win an upcoming competition.

episodes.name: Spaced Out
episodes.overview: While the town is held spellbound by a purported UFO, the bank is being robbed. Jody is kidnapped and Colt traces the origin of the UFO, and it seems to rain money.

episodes.name: Strange Bedfellows
episodes.overview: A wild tale in which a man who fails to convince Colt to bail out a woman, takes Jody hostage to further his cause. The woman has an urgent need to pick up a million dollars.

episodes.name: The Molly Sue
episodes.overview: Terri took the airplane as collateral and it was stolen, so Colt is sent to Panama to retrieve it or Ace. Anyone who watched the Rockford Files knows that Angel, played by Margolin, was never up to any good and he plays the skip the same way.

episodes.name: One Hundred Miles a Gallon
episodes.overview: The son of one of Colt's friends skips and Colt goes to South Carolina after him, but they aren't running moonshine like he thought and the regular drivers quit

episodes.name: P.S., I Love You
episodes.overview: Tab Hunter is framed for the murder of a debt collector and Colt sets out to find the real culprit.

episodes.name: The Chameleon
episodes.overview: A man who was a master of disguise takes part in an staged accident to cover the robbery of an armored car.

episodes.name: The Chase
episodes.overview: Max sees a murder in the parking lot where he was about to steal a car. He is arrested and the killers escape. Now he is the target.

episodes.name: Just a Small Circle of Friends
episodes.overview: An industrialist begs Colt to rescue his daughter from a cult which she thinks is great, but isn't quite what she believes.

episodes.name: Devil's Island
episodes.overview: Fred wants Mary detained long enough to keep her from testifying against his boss. She is in Mexico. Opening stunt is a choreographed battle in free fall.

episodes.name: Trauma (concluded on series "Trauma Center")
episodes.overview: Howie is seriously hurt in a sabotaged stunt meant to keep them from testifying against a thief. This episode is part one and part two was on "Trauma Center".

episodes.name: Pleasure Isle
episodes.overview: Ivy bides her time and then uses the computer to abstract Vessman's assets. He kidnaps her and attempts to get the code numbers from her to regain his assets. Colt to the rescue.

episodes.name: Baker's Dozen
episodes.overview: Colt is sent to a dude ranch in Arizona after a bail jumper, but he finds it is a paramilitary encampment.

episodes.name: The Last Drive
episodes.overview: Colt is sent to a dude ranch in Arizona after a bail jumper, but he finds it is a paramilitary encampment.

episodes.name: TKO
episodes.overview: Colt tries to protect a fight manager from the mob.

episodes.name: Dirty Laundry
episodes.overview: Flo hits an amourous man, is jailed, and then jumps bail. She flees to Reno where she is involved with a money laundering scheme.

episodes.name: Inside, Outside
episodes.overview: Colt refuses a bribe, so Terri is kidnapped to pressure him not to testify.

episodes.name: Nashville Pirates
episodes.overview: Colt encounters a case of piracy when he goes after a bounty in Nashville. He performs 'The Unknown Stuntman'.

episodes.name: Hollywood Shorties
episodes.overview: A drug dealer needs a midget to retrieve his stash. Opening stunt: the midgets trip and 'net' a man.

episodes.name: To the Finish
episodes.overview: Fargo is afraid pat will recognize him from the past, so he hires two thugs to keep him away from a car race.

episodes.name: Wheels
episodes.overview: A former stuntman, now disabled, is reunited with his former fiancee by Colt in Seattle. He dumped her after his accident. Colt has a wild ride downhill in a wheelchair.

episodes.name: Cool Hand Colt
episodes.overview: A corporation wants to drain the bayou. Colt is sent to bring back Junior to testify, but is put in a chain gang and the sheriff is out to kill him.

episodes.name: The Huntress
episodes.overview: Colt searches for a hit woman who likes expensive art.

episodes.name: Bite of the Wasp
episodes.overview: They set up a sting to catch a politician who is extorting money from a movie producer.

episodes.name: Rabbit's Feet
episodes.overview: Colt and his assistants become fugitives after they are involved in a jail break in Argentina.

episodes.name: Olympic Quest
episodes.overview: Colt's sister inadvertantly tapes a kidnapping at the Winter Olympics in Sarajevo. Colt comes to her assistance when she is threatened by two thugs who want the tape.

episodes.name: Always Say Always
episodes.overview: Actresses interrupt work on a "James Bond" film to help Colt catch smugglers in Hong Kong and return a Ming vase.

episodes.name: King of the Cowboys
episodes.overview: Roy Rogers and former TV cowboy stars John Russell, Peter Breck, Jock Mahoney and Roy Rogers Jr. join Colt's posse to track a gang of diamond smugglers using horses.

episodes.name: Boom
episodes.overview: A drug dealer who lost $250,000 when Colt nabbed his bail-jumping son holds hospitalized Jody and others hostage for $1 million.

episodes.name: Undersea Odyssey
episodes.overview: An insurance investigator trying to retrieve sunken gold deals with both Colt and his bail-jumping quarry.

episodes.name: Old Heroes Never Die
episodes.overview: An ex-baseball player is now a swindler with a big debt.

episodes.name: Losers Weepers (1)
episodes.overview: A cast of comedians, an insurance agent and the theft of $3 million interact in this episode.

episodes.name: Losers Weepers (2)
episodes.overview: A cast of comedians, an insurance agent and the theft of $3 million interact in this episode.

episodes.name: Stranger Than Fiction
episodes.overview: A novelist, who made an incriminating tape, is chased through the Everglades, by a syndicate boss who wants the tape, after his aide accidentally falls out a window and she is accused of pushing him.

episodes.name: Prisoner
episodes.overview: Jody is arrested in a small town and sent to the prison farm where female inmates are destined to be sold into white slavery.

episodes.name: Terror U.
episodes.overview: Colt hides in a frat house from hit men, after he picks up his latest bounty, who was turning state's evidence in a money laundering case.

episodes.name: Private Eyes
episodes.overview: Former private eyes, Cannon and Petrocelli, stick their noses into the case of the stolen stunt cars.

episodes.name: Sandcastles
episodes.overview: Colt and Howie pursue a murder suspect to Hawaii, only to discover that Jody has fallen in love with him and let him escape.

episodes.name: Dead Bounty
episodes.overview: Colt has to leave his prisoner in the care of the local sheriff and finds that, during the night, his prisoner has been severely beaten and is in a coma. The sheriff accuses Colt of brutality and Colt becomes a fugitive.

episodes.name: The San Francisco Caper
episodes.overview: A bored teen-aged girl stows away in Colt's truck while he is searching for a diamond thief.

episodes.name: Baja 1000
episodes.overview: Dell Loomis is the man who gave Colt his break and he has been holding it over his head to get him to do things for him. He is also duplicitous.

episodes.name: The Winner
episodes.overview: Problems arise at the Special Olympics.

episodes.name: Semi-Catastrophe
episodes.overview: Colt helps an independent trucker who is the victim of a loan shark and a gambling habit.

episodes.name: Her Bodyguard
episodes.overview: Colt is assigned to be the bodyguard for a woman who is the target of a hitman.

episodes.name: I Love Paris
episodes.overview: Colt is sent to Paris on false pretenses. His real object is to identify a terrorist assassin only he can recognize.

episodes.name: Sheriff Seavers
episodes.overview: Colt acts as sheriff in a town owned by the bounty's father.

episodes.name: Tailspin
episodes.overview: Wild Bill Hillman needs some money to keep his air show afloat, so he 'borrows' some from a buried stash. Unfortunately, he is caught and the mobsters want all the money.

episodes.name: High Orbit
episodes.overview: Thieves change the stunt to cover the theft of a chip from a space shuttle.

episodes.name: Rockabye Baby
episodes.overview: Colt trails a bail-jumping girl singer accused of murder.

episodes.name: Spring Break
episodes.overview: Colt is in Florida on the trail of a computer hacker, who inadvertantly copied the secret account kept by his Professor in the same file as his next exam questions.

episodes.name: Split Image
episodes.overview: A mobster who has been threatened finds a shoe salesman who is a look-a-like for a him and then the fun begins.

episodes.name: Skip Family Robinson
episodes.overview: Nick, the boss, has undergone plastic surgery, but Shelby can identify him and has a grudge against George. He promises his honest daughter that he will go straight if she will help him this one last time.

episodes.name: Reel Trouble
episodes.overview: Colt takes three stunt women to Turkey for a film that is meant to fail. One of the women is a self-willed novice and botches some scenes, while they all get mixed up with a drug deal.

episodes.name: Dead Ringer
episodes.overview: Colt is sent after a jumper and then discovers his quarry has entered an Elvis Presley impersonator contest and merged with the crowd.

episodes.name: King of the Stuntmen
episodes.overview: There is a 'King of the Stuntmen' contest.

episodes.name: Femme Fatale
episodes.overview: Howie goes undercover as a female impersonator, Denise, when the skip is a material witness in hiding.

episodes.name: A Fistful of Lire
episodes.overview: Colt has to protect an Italian village.

episodes.name: The Life of Riley
episodes.overview: When Colt catches a young man wanted in Los Angeles, he stumbles into a 'kidnapping for adoption' ring in Sacramento. Simon begs Colt to wait one more day while he checks out his last lead - a VW that matches the one used in the kidnapping.

episodes.name: October the Thirty Second
episodes.overview: Elvira and company are filming a horror movie in an old haunted mansion during a storm, of course.

episodes.name: Seavers, Dead Or Alive
episodes.overview: The tables are turned when Colt is framed and becomes a fugitive.

episodes.name: Escape Claus
episodes.overview: A fitting story for Christmas - Santa is arrested for freeing the reindeer. He asks what each wants for Christmas. Jody wants a 'white' Christmas in spite of the current heat wave; Colt reluctantly says he needs a new truck. There is a child care center threatened with eviction and some crooks want the bonds Santa's cellmate is hiding.

episodes.name: No Rms., Ocean Vu.
episodes.overview: Colt is stranded on a desert isle with a spoiled socialite, who has a perfume company, after their plane is shot down by robbers.

episodes.name: Miami's Nice
episodes.overview: An FBI agent persuades Colt to participate in a cocaine sting. Jody presents awards to Miss Stuntwoman USA winners.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: One of Colt's old classmates steals his own jewels for the insurance money.

episodes.name: Trial By Fire
episodes.overview: An old army buddy begs Colt to rescue one of the group that was betrayed years ago in Vietnam. He insists a recent photo shows the man as a POW even though everyone believes he is dead.

episodes.name: In His Shadow
episodes.overview: A young man arrives who might be Colt's son.

episodes.name: The Lucky Stiff
episodes.overview: Jerry has lost his money, house and wife, so he puts out a contract on himself - then wins the lottery.

episodes.name: Beach Blanket Bounty
episodes.overview: A severe earthquake rocks L.A. and Colt coincidentally is involved with a 'rock' group, who want $20,000, and an industrial.

episodes.name: The Last Chance Platoon
episodes.overview: Colt becomes the drill instructor for a platoon of misfits.

episodes.name: I Now Pronounce You ... Dead
episodes.overview: Pearl wants Colt to grab the skip during his wedding, but one of his wives beats him to it. As his creditors chase him, more wives turn up.

episodes.name: Two On a Skip
episodes.overview: Trench sends Colt after another bounty hunter who he thinks is taking too long and spending too much.

episodes.name: The Lady in Green
episodes.overview: An old actor who played "Silver Blade", a Zorro type crime fighter, in his earlier days, witnesses a murder and wants to go after the killer.

episodes.name: Tag Team
episodes.overview: Colt wins two pro wrestlers (losers) and Howie trains them. They do come in handy in a pinch.

episodes.name: War On Wheels
episodes.overview: A town was bought to become a reservoir, but one resident refuses to leave. His granddaughter wants to put him in a rest home. Howie has a remote 'out-of-control' tank. A gang of bikers have them all trapped in the town.

episodes.name: The Bigger They Are
episodes.overview: A cop wants evidence against a club owner who sells pcp to kids.
